sentence.Network_en: The birds will winter outside in an aviary.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟儿们将在外面的大鸟笼里过冬。

sentence.Network_en: The owner said the bird may have escaped through a weak spot in the aviary.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟的主人说这只鸟可能是从鸟舍一处不结实的地方逃走的。

sentence.Network_en: I kept the birds indoors all winter and introduced them into an aviary the following June.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个冬天我把鸟关在室内，然后在接下来的6月份把它们放入鸟类饲养场饲养。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin aviarium, from avis 'bird'

entry.def: An aviary is a large cage or covered area in which birds are kept.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where birds are kept

auth_sentence.content: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.
auth_sentence.res_content: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.

auth_sentence.content: The aviary has more than 100 species of birds and is working to breed and preserve threatened species.
auth_sentence.res_content: The aviary has more than 100 species of birds and is working to breed and preserve threatened species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The aviary has more than 100 species of birds and is working to breed and preserve threatened species.

auth_sentence.content: The park's head gardener, Kevin Lenton, found the birds lying on the floor of their aviary on Wednesday morning.
auth_sentence.res_content: The park's head gardener, Kevin Lenton, found the birds lying on the floor of their aviary on Wednesday morning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The park's head gardener, Kevin Lenton, found the birds lying on the floor of their aviary on Wednesday morning.
